main event: A UFO was spotted hovering and moving slowly in River Forest, Illinois between January 1 and January 10, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed through binoculars and appeared silver in color,The object displayed no outward appearance of speed,It would occasionally fade in and out and change in size,There is a record of an 8mm film taken by a witness,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes during the early morning hours.
witness description: Mrs. F. who recorded a sighting and filmed the object.
